name: The Curious Case of Jenny Death
name_original: The Curious Case of Jenny Death
description:
The Curious Case of Jenny Death.

Browser dimensions are bad so download it if you want to play it good.

Thrilling to the bone twin stick shooter (controller not yet supported). Experience the true hell of a mind. Stuck inside a forest you must confront your demons. Grab the gun from up your sleeve and serve those baddies voila.

Minimalist art direction encourages fan theories and open interpretation. Lack of a health bar forces the player to examine their own mortality and instant menus makes all these AAAs cry in shame.

First try at a 2D game so no bulli pls.
